mapper.sql: id, sportid, sportname, campus, classes, profession, stunumber, stuname, currentime,checked

sportid,
sportname,
campus,
classes,
profession,

mapper.update:
update contestant_table
sportid = #{sportid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sportname = #{sportname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
campus = #{campus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classes = #{classes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stunumber = #{stunumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuname = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
currentime = #{currentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked =#{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update contestant_table set sportid = #{sportid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sportname = #{sportname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, campus = #{campus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classes = #{classes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stunumber = #{stunumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuname = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currentime = #{currentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update contestant_table set checked=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from contestant_table where sportid=#{sportid} and stunumber=#{stunumber} and currentime=#{currentime}
select * from contestant_table where currentime=#{currentime} and checked=1 limit #{tempPage},#{pageCapacity}
